title: Location

content:
Schedule Office hours take place on Day at Hour.
Location By default meetings are in my office. I am also available for virtual meetings on Zoom.
Meeting material If we are meeting to discuss research, please send me a written description of the work that you would like to discus. Presentation slides or paper draft are perfectly fine. If you do not have those, please send a one-page description of the research. Please send me the material by 8pm on the evening prior of our meeting.
